nodes.text: Vanzeist was a terrestrial astronomical object where the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry celebrated a victory against the Galactic Empire sometime by 3 ABY. During that year, Prelate Verge, a member of the Imperial Ruling Council, promised the Imperial Lieutenant Kourterel that a detail of stormtroopers would be sent to protect his family from members of the Alliance on Vanzeist. Later in 3 ABY, First Sergeant Hazram Namir remembered the celebration on the world while recollecting occasions in the 61st at the funeral of the company's captain, Micha Evon.
Vanzeist was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
